Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Authorizes a parent access to retrieve and view text messages on a minor child's telephone
Summary: Authorizes a parent access to retrieve and view text messages on a minor child's telephone and authorizes a telephone company to charge an additional fee for such access.
LawCode: Ren §399-dd to be §676, add §677, desig §§676 & 677 to be Art 32-A, add Art head, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to authorizing a parent access to retrieve and view text messages on a minor child's telephone
